0: Last night, on Saturday Night Live, Dakota Johnson graduated from high school and joined ISIS. Her proud and teary-eyed dad, played by Taran Killiam, dropped her off. "Death to America," shouted an ISIS fighter played by Kyle Mooney. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR The sketch is a parody of this Toyota Camry ad, in which a father drops his daughter off at the airport on her way to join the (presumably American) military. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR It also references the teen girls who are leaving home to join ISIS from all around the world. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Unsurprisingly, there was a lot of finger-wagging on social media about the sketch. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR I'm going to go ahead and voice my opinion on the #SNL ISIS skit. Absolutely hell no, under any circumstance.
